pluggable.name: YUI 2.0 WYSIWYG Editor
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Publish posts using the YUI WYSIWYG editor.

help.value:
Provides a rich editing environment using the YUI WYSIWYG Javascript library. Find out more about the YUI editor at http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/editor/

The editor needs to be enabled in your User Options.
